metadata.title: TaskLap - Simple Todo & Checklist App.
metadata.description: Simple and easy-to-use task management app. Features Focus Mode and checklist functionality.

hero.title: Simple Todo & Checklist App.
hero.subtitle: Simple and easy-to-use task management
hero.description: Manage tasks efficiently with intuitive operations. Focus Mode, checklist features, and 8-language support to assist your daily life.

focusMode.title: Focus Mode
focusMode.subtitle: A display mode to focus on one task
focusMode.description: Focus Mode is a display mode that eliminates distractions and allows you to concentrate on just one task.
focusMode.benefitsSubtitle: Focus Mode provides an environment for better concentration

simpleChoice.title: Simple Choice
simpleChoice.description: Only two options: complete or skip

smartContinue.title: Smart Continuation
smartContinue.description: Automatic transition to the next task

checklist.title: Reusable Checklists
checklist.subtitle: Use lists you create over and over
checklist.description: Easily manage recurring checklists for travel preparation, shopping lists, work tasks, and more. Reset with one click for reuse after completion.
checklist.instructions: Tap items, add, and reset after completion for reuse
checklist.resetInstructions: After completion, use the reset button to uncheck all items and reuse the same list.
checklist.simpleCheckDescription: Tap once to check or uncheck items. Enjoy intuitive and comfortable operation.
checklist.addItemsDescription: Add new items whenever needed. Lists can be freely edited.

focusMode.title: Focus Mode
focusMode.description: Concentrate on one task for efficient work

simple.title: Simple Setup
simple.detail: No account required, no complex settings

cta.title: Boost Your Productivity with TaskLap Now
cta.description: Revolutionize your task management with Focus Mode and checklist features

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: TaskLap excels in various situations
useCases.supportProductivity: From morning focus time to habit formation, TaskLap supports your productivity improvement

morning.title: Morning Focus Time
morning.description: Focus on important tasks with Focus Mode

requirements.title: System Requirements
requirements.ios: iOS 16.0 or later, iPhone & iPad compatible

download.title: Download TaskLap Now
download.subtitle: Simple and easy-to-use task management app.
download.description: Download for free now and manage your daily tasks efficiently.
download.storeSubmission: üì± Currently under app store review. Available soon!

instant.title: Start Using Instantly
instant.description: No account registration required, ready to use after download

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: No hidden fees, all features available for free

multilingual.title: 8 Language Support
multilingual.description: Fully localized in 8 languages including English

footer.supportMessage: Easy-to-use task management to support your daily life.

meta.title: TaskLap - Transform Your Focus with Task Management App
meta.description: Focus Mode that lets you concentrate on one task. Offline operation, 8-language support, beautiful design task management app.

keyPoint.title: Important: TaskLap is a completely private app
keyPoint.description: Your data is never sent externally. All data is managed only within your device.

dataCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: TaskLap app stores only the following information on your device:

noDataCollection.title: 2. Information We Do Not Collect
noDataCollection.description: We do not collect any of the following information:
items: Personal information (name, email address, phone number, etc.)

dataStorage.title: 3. Data Storage and Management
dataStorage.subtitle: Complete Local Storage:
items: All data is stored only in the SQLite database on your device
When you delete the app, all data is completely removed

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not share your data with any of the following:

security.title: 5. Security
security.description: Since your data is managed only on your device, it is protected by your device's security settings (passcode, fingerprint authentication, etc.).

advertising.title: 6. Advertising
advertising.description: TaskLap app does not display any advertisements.

ageRequirement.title: 7. Age Requirement
ageRequirement.description: TaskLap app is intended for users aged 13 and above. Users under 13 should use this app with parental consent.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please feel free to contact us:

changes.title: 9. Policy Changes
changes.description: This privacy policy may be updated in response to changes in legal requirements or additions to app features. When there are significant changes, we will notify you in advance through the app or website.

common.applicationInProgress: üì± Currently under app store review. Available soon!

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message about TaskLap and we'll respond as soon as possible.

support.title: Support
support.description: We're here to help with technical questions

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Check our FAQ before reaching out.

form.title: Send us a Message

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your question or feedback...

form.privacy: Your information will only be used to respond to your inquiry.
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
